title: Quintin Cutts - Teaching Programming: Too much doing, not enough understanding
description: Quintin has researched and practised programming education for 15 years, involved in UK, US and Australasian projects. He has explored many instructional designs, endeavouring to maximise the value of face-to-face teaching using technology and peer-based learning. He is closely involved with schools, having led CS Inside in Scotland and now running a successful Undergraduate Ambassadors Scheme course.
